languages.text: "Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... Проклятые предатели! Да как они посмели ранить Дитя!"

traits.locale_text: "Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... Проклятые предатели! Да как они посмели ранить Дитя!"

languages.text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"
languages.original_text: "Не представляю, как такое могло случиться... Проклятые предатели! Да как они посмели ранить Дитя!"

traits.locale_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Bloody renegades! How could they injure the Child!"
"I cannot imagine how this could happen... Bloody renegades! How could they injure the Child!"
"I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"
"I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"
"I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

languages.text: “我真不敢想象居然会发生这种事情……那些该死的叛徒！他们竟敢伤害圣子！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: “我真不敢想象居然会发生这种事情……那些该死的叛徒！他们竟敢伤害那个孩子！”

languages.text: «No puedo creerme que haya pasado esto... ¡Malditos traidores! ¿Cómo se atreven a hacer daño a la niña?».
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo creerme que haya pasado esto... ¡Malditos traidores! ¿Cómo se atreven a hacer daño a la niña?».

languages.text: 「このようなことが起こるとは…忌々しい裏切り者め！子供を傷つけようなどと！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: 「このようなことが起こるとは…忌々しい裏切り者め！子供を傷つけようなどと！」

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie das geschehen konnte ... Verfluchte Verräter! Wie konnten sie das Kind verletzen!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, wie das geschehen konnte ... Verfluchte Verräter! Wie konnten sie das Kind verletzen!"

languages.text: « Comment cela a-t-il pu se produire... Sales traîtres ! Ils ont osé s'en prendre à l'Enfant ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment cela a-t-il pu se produire... Sales traîtres ! Ils ont osé s'en prendre à l'Enfant ! »

languages.text: "Böyle bir şey nasıl olabilir?.. Lanet olasıca hainler! Nasıl olur da Çocuk'u yaralarlar?"
languages.original_text: "I cannot imagine how this could happen... Damned traitors! How could they injure the Child!"

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şey nasıl olabilir... Lanet olasıca hainler! Nasıl olur da Çocuk'u yaralarlar!"
